mapper.select: SELECT CA.CART_NO AS no , CA.CART_AMOUNT AS stock , P.PROD_NO AS "product.no" , P.PROD_NAME AS "product.name" , P.PROD_PRICE AS "product.price" , PC.COLOR_NO AS "color.no" , PC.COLOR_NAME AS "color.name" , PS.SIZE_NO AS "size.no" , PS.PROD_SIZE AS "size.size" , U.USER_NO AS "user.no" , U.USER_NAME AS "user.name" , PI.IMG_URL AS imgThum FROM CARTS CA JOIN PRODUCTS P ON CA.PROD_NO = P.PROD_NO JOIN PROD_COLORS PC ON CA.COLOR_NO = PC.COLOR_NO JOIN PROD_SIZES PS ON CA.SIZE_NO = PS.SIZE_NO JOIN USERS U ON CA.USER_NO = U.USER_NO JOIN PROD_IMGS PI ON PC.COLOR_NO = PI.COLOR_NO WHERE PI.IMG_THUM = 'Y' AND U.USER_NO = #{userNo}

SELECT CA.CART_NO AS no , CA.CART_AMOUNT AS amount , P.PROD_NO AS "product.no" , P.PROD_NAME AS "product.name" , P.PROD_PRICE AS "product.price" , PC.COLOR_NO AS "color.no" , PC.COLOR_NAME AS "color.name" , PS.SIZE_NO AS "size.no" , PS.PROD_SIZE AS "size.size" , U.USER_NO AS "user.no" , U.USER_NAME AS "user.name" , PI.IMG_URL AS imgThum FROM CARTS CA JOIN PRODUCTS P ON CA.PROD_NO = P.PROD_NO JOIN PROD_COLORS PC ON CA.COLOR_NO = PC.COLOR_NO JOIN PROD_SIZES PS ON CA.SIZE_NO = PS.SIZE_NO JOIN USERS U ON CA.USER_NO = U.USER_NO JOIN PROD_IMGS PI ON PC.COLOR_NO = PI.COLOR_NO WHERE PI.IMG_THUM = 'Y' AND U.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND PS.SIZE_NO = #{sizeNo}
